lead_paragraph: Patrick O'Sullivan scored the go-ahead goal for the United States yesterday in a 4-2 victory over host Latvia in the world championships. The United States clinched a berth in the quarterfinals. Canada, Finland and the Czech Republic also advanced to the quarterfinals from Group E. Latvia and Norway were eliminated. In Group F, Belarus routed Ukraine, 9-1, to close in on a spot in the final eight. Only Russia has qualified for the quarterfinals from Group F; Sweden, Switzerland and Belarus are favored to clinch berths.
